titleStmt.title: Numb. 86 The curranto this weeke from Holland
titleStmt.author: Hilten, Jan van. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by T. Harper?] for Nath. Butter and Nic. Bourne,

notesStmt.note: The last of the 10th series of newbooks issud by Butter and Bourne, Dec. 20, 1638-June 21, 1639; pagination and register is continuous throughout the entire series of 100 numbers.
All but the final new item of the issue are translated from number 24 of the Dutch corantos of Jan van Hilten--Dahl.
Identified as STC 13571 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
